product.description:

The ultimate breathable, double brushed stretch fabric. IguanaMed offers sporty sophisticated appeal and revolutionary comfort stretch fabric that won't wrinkle. Feels and wears like a dream.

  • 28" length
  • Made with 63.5% polyester/33.5% cotton/3% spandex
